com.blazegraph.gremlin.structure

Interface BlazeGraph.Options

  • Enclosing class:
    BlazeGraph

    public static interface BlazeGraph.Options
    Options that can be specified in the graph configuration.
    Author:
    mikepersonick

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int DEFAULT_SPARQL_LOG_MAX
      Defaults to 10k.
      static String LIST_INDEX_FLOOR
      An internal option set by the concrete implementation as a floor to use when assigning list index values for Cardinality.list properties.
      static String MAX_QUERY_TIME
      The max query time for Sparql queries before timeout.
      static String SPARQL_LOG_MAX
      Maximum number of chars to print through the SparqlLogger.
      static String VALUE_FACTORY
      The BlazeValueFactory instance this graph should use.

    • Field Detail

      • VALUE_FACTORY

        static final String VALUE_FACTORY
        The BlazeValueFactory instance this graph should use. Defaults to BlazeValueFactory.INSTANCE.

      • MAX_QUERY_TIME

        static final String MAX_QUERY_TIME
        The max query time for Sparql queries before timeout. Defaults to infinite (0).

      • LIST_INDEX_FLOOR

        static final String LIST_INDEX_FLOOR
        An internal option set by the concrete implementation as a floor to use when assigning list index values for Cardinality.list properties. Default is System.currentTimeMillis(), but better is to use the last commit time of the database (which could be in the future in cases of clock skew).

      • SPARQL_LOG_MAX

        static final String SPARQL_LOG_MAX
        Maximum number of chars to print through the SparqlLogger.

      • DEFAULT_SPARQL_LOG_MAX

        static final int DEFAULT_SPARQL_LOG_MAX
        Defaults to 10k.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
